post.body: not on the bill iphone ya don't! they love iPhone users THAT much more!
kinda-sorta, have my old meteor phone i found today w/4â‚¬ of credit - no free texts. On O2 the rest of the time =/
go for it, number?
Have yourself a very @damienmulley Christmas eh?
that was texting though, totally different altogether! :P
yank!? ah now! Kerryman, yes, American no! :-)
You clearly haven't cleaned up after a houseparty involving idiots and gone off wine then :)
Are girls taller in Dublin? Am I living in the wrong county?
nothing says hello quite like screaming "we draw to death" over and over eh? :D
The One Armed Boxer Vs. the Flying Gillotuine is mine. @fromfirstotlast was kind enough to make me it! =D you?
Oh seriously? Back I go to that From First to Last one then!!!
I knew it was quieter down here for a reason! You did a good thing! They're prolly lost in Waterford.
i'll take a free SIM+credit, but can I have an e71 to go with that too? ;)
same. well. i need to try and get to the cinema to get 2 tix. that's not gonna be easy..
welcome to twitter you!
we'll think of something, Alan! You're still my other half in my mind! :-P
I hated reading about people I didn't give a damn about GRATE NITE LOLZ XoXoXoXo CUM SEE MAH CAMZ sxcbeor97@hotmail.com
thanks for the add! excuse the noise! :D
i've never laughed so hard at a tweet before.
didn't un-follow you! i'll delete/re-add you there.
i'll bring up a People Republic of Cork t-shirt for anyone who wants one!!
night Joe!!
either is better compared to the four-thirds system of my olympus ;)
I've been so tempted to take a picture of a tin of beans and a can of beer.
I've fallen in love with the word "fab" again
Since @PatPhelan told me I was a noisy twitter-er at the blogger dinner I've been awfully concious of my tweeting, hasn't changed much rly!
The Greatest Man Who Ever Lived - Weezer. Going to turn that into a ringtone! @ElleBrigitte, your Mom doesn't have that, does she? =P
Guitar solo from "More Than A Feeling" is my new ringtone.
If you ever wanted to put me to sleep, just talk to me about what you did to save the world in 4th year.
iTunes DRM is shit.
Feeds read, podcasts downloaded, phone synced, teeth brushed. A very nighty-noo to you t'land. I shall talkcha in the afternoon!
Cool. (sane) girlfriend and deleted my Bebo profile. 2 new years resolutions sorted early then.
Might just have himself a girlfriend and no "relationship status" to update. Bummer!
Tea and the Nialler9 podcast - fantastic stuff.
I'm free! Bebo account has been closed.
And we asked these guys to sponsor us! http://twitpic.com/y1ru
Walking doggy with Mom. Dog being overtly friendly to eveyone and everything. Taking her time to sniff ALL the poo in Cork
Town. Date. Yay?
Good morning everyone! Is it weird that I could probably sleep for another good few hours?
Off to bed. Alarm set to 12 for tomorrow only. I want a lie-in. Nighty-noo t'land!!!
